Package src.recomanador.Utils

Class StringOperations

java.lang.Object
src.recomanador.Utils.StringOperations
public class StringOperations extends Object
Class that works with strings and types that are associated for strings

  • Method Details

    • esNombre

      public static boolean esNombre(String s)
      Function that tells if a string is made up of numbers
      Parameters:
      s - input string made up of any characters
      Returns:
      returns false if the string has any character that does not belong to a positive integer, true if if has only numbers or if it's empty

    • esNombre

      public static boolean esNombre(char s)
      Simple function that returns if the character is a number
      Parameters:
      s - character to check
      Returns:
      true if the character is between 0 and 9, both included, false otherwise

    • esFloat

      public static boolean esFloat(String s)
      Checks if a string can be treated as a float
      Parameters:
      s - string to check
      Returns:
      true if the string can be parsed as a float which can have a point, an exponent and can be negative, false otherwise

    • esData

      public static boolean esData(String s)
      Returns if a string can be treated as a date
      Parameters:
      s - input string
      Returns:
      true if the string if of the form xx-xx-xxxx or xx/xx/xxxx or xxxx-xx-xx or xxxx/xx/xx where x is a number, false otherwise

    • esBool

      public static boolean esBool(String s)
      Checks if a string can be treated as a bool
      Parameters:
      s - input string
      Returns:
      true if the string equals "true" or "false", false otherwise

    • compararAtributs

      public static int compararAtributs(String s1, String s2, Item.tipus tipus)
      Compares two attributes of two types and returns which one is bigger
      Parameters:
      s1 - first input string
      s2 - second input string
      tipus - type of the two strings, must be common for both
      Returns:
      Three cases: -1 if s1 < s2 0 if s1 = s2 1 id s1 > s2

    • dataToTime

      public static int dataToTime(String s)
      Returns the time in days since 00-00-0000 that represents the string
      Parameters:
      s - input string that can be treated as a date
      Returns:
      int time that represents the string, where years are 365 days and months are 30 days

    • divideString

      public static ArrayList<String> divideString(String s, char divider)
      Divides a string into several substrings with a divider
      Parameters:
      s - input string
      divider - character that represents the division of a string
      Returns:
      ArrayList of substrings where the divider does not appear

    • infinitString

      public static String infinitString()
      Returns a big string to represent the maximum string possible (not actually the maximum)
      Returns:
      a string of 4096 'Z'

    • minDis

      public static int minDis(String s1, String s2, int n, int m, int[][] dp)
      Returns the minimum edit distance to transform form a string to another
      Parameters:
      s1 - first input string
      s2 - second input string
      n - size of the first string (s1)
      m - size of the second string (s2)
      dp - array matrix of n+1 x m+1 dimesions filled with -1, table to perform dynamic programming
      Returns:
      number of modifications (add, delete or modify a character from a tring) to achieve an equal string

    • stringToType

      public static Item.tipus stringToType(String s) throws src.recomanador.excepcions.ItemTypeNotValidException
      Returns the type that represents a string
      Parameters:
      s - input string
      Returns:
      tipus in funtion of the input string
      Throws:
      src.recomanador.excepcions.ItemTypeNotValidException - if s does not contain a type

    • tipusToString

      public static String tipusToString(Item.tipus t)
      Returns a string based of the input tipus
      Parameters:
      t - input tipus to transform to string
      Returns:
      a string based of the tipus (Identificador, Boolean, Float, String, Data) can be "No assignat" if the type is not recognissed

    • tipusCorrecte

      public static boolean tipusCorrecte(String s, Item.tipus t)
      Checks if a string can be treated as type t
      Parameters:
      s - string that is going to be checked
      t - type that is going to be checked
      Returns:
      true if s can be treated as type t, false if s cannot be treated as type t

    • distanciaAtribut

      public static float distanciaAtribut(String a1, String a2, Item.tipus t, float min, float max) throws src.recomanador.excepcions.ItemTypeNotValidException
      Computes the similarity between to strings that belong to the same column. The similarity for each type is measured differently
      Parameters:
      a1 - first string to be compared
      a2 - second string to be compared
      t - Type of atribute
      min - Min value possible
      max - Max value possible
      Returns:
      float between 0 and 1 where 0 means completely different and 1 means exaclty the same
      Throws:
      src.recomanador.excepcions.ItemTypeNotValidException - if a1 and a2 are not of the same type
